data.text:
It would be nice to have another “faction” to depict Eastern Europe factions.

Technically this “faction” does transit from Varangians to Cossacks.

Chapter 1. Short info

Red Ruthenia / Chervonaya Rus is the name used since early medieval times to refer to the area between today’s Poland and Ukraine. The region was part of Kievan Rus’ (882–1240) and, from 1199 to 1772 different independent Kingdoms. While its people did maintain their own culture and identity, the Region did frequently participate and rebel in the wars of Poland, Russia, Lithuania, Mongols and Tatars.

Centred on Przemyśl (Peremyshl) and Belz, it has included major cities such as: Chełm, Zamość, Rzeszów, Krosno and Sanok (now all in Poland), as well as Lviv and Ternopil (in Ukraine).

Source 1

Source 2

[Source ########################################################## Source 4

Chapter 2 Music Concept

Chapter 3 Coat of arms featured frequently a golden lion

Chapter 4. Short Region History

—Cherven Grods often literally translated as Red Cities, Red Forts or Red Boroughs, was a point of dispute between the Kingdom of Poland and Kievan Rus’ at the turn of 10th and 11th centuries

Source

—Independent Rus principality and successor state (1199–1246)

—Principality of Galicia–Volhynia (1199–1253)

—Kingdom of Ruthenia (1253–1349)

—Galicia–Volhynia Wars. From 1340 to 1392 the civil war in the region transitioned into a power struggle between Lithuania, Poland, and Hungary.

— Ruthenian Voivodeship Established 1434 / Disestablished 1772

Ruthenia was subject to repeated Tatar and Ottoman Empire incursions during the 16th and 17th centuries and was impacted by the Khmelnytsky Uprising (1648–1654)

Chapter 5 Unique Faction Traits?

Well historically they had to build a lot of Stone Castles to defend themselves from invasions, were more farmers than hunters, while Varangians and Cossacks were more mercenaries and raiders, than warriors and soldiers.

Ages more adjusted to their history?

Dark Age, the Feudal Age, the Castle Age,

for Imperial divide it into the Incursions Age and the Uprising Age

—Dark Age:

Unit Varangian Raider, with bonus damage against buildings and can loot buildings like mongols.

—Feudal Age

Can harvest fields 25% faster, but they do get depleted after time.

—Castle Age

Can generate Pigs for meat, like Mongols can generate sheep.

—Incursions Age

Build stone Walls and Castles gets cheaper.

—Uprising Age: get Access to Cossacks and Gun Powder

Foot Cossacks were called Serdyuk, Armed with a musket. Gun Powder Unit

Sich Cossack faster light horseman armed with a saber, but almost no armour.

Chapter 6 Landmarks and research? Maybe a different Mechanic to Age and Tech up?

there are for example Varangian runestones

So why not build several smaller “landmarks” to unlock new tech?

Like Build Rune Stones to get better armour.
